segments.text: Hey honey , how was your day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was alright . I ran into Bill and we got to talking for a while.He ’ s in a bit of a jam .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , his son had an accident and Bill doesn ’ t have health insurance . This really got me thinking , and I wondered if we shouldn ’ t look into a couple of different HMO ’ s .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , you ’ re right . We aren ’ t getting any younger and our kids are getting older .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Exactly ! I searched on the web and found a couple of HMO ’ s with low co-pays and good coverage . The deductibles are low , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds good , although , do you think we can qualify for insurance ? Those insurance companies are real pirates when it comes to money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we don ’ t have any pre-existing illnesses or conditions , so we should be fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish our company or country provided us with healthcare .
segments.speaker: S1
